00012 QWidget* AccountEditType::createEditor() const
00013 {
00014     QComboBox *editor = new QComboBox(false, table()->viewport());
00015     editor->insertStringList(QStringList("Normal") << "Type 2" << "Type 3" << "Type 4");
00016     if(content == "Normal")
00017         editor->setCurrentItem(0);
00018     if(content == "Type 2")
00019         editor->setCurrentItem(1);
00020     if(content == "Type 3")
00021         editor->setCurrentItem(2);
00022     if(content == "Type 4")
00023         editor->setCurrentItem(3);
00024     return editor;
00025 }
